posts.post_title: T206 Hoblitzell Blank Back on eBay
posts.post_content:
[url]http://www.ebay.com/itm/152536782784?ul_noapp=true[/url]

Hi, I am selling this (stunning and unique) T206 Hoblitzell Blank Back. It's one of the best examples I've ever seen or owned- wide hand-cut borders, clean front & back. No reserve auction.

Thanks for looking,

MS
